page.title: 02LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: { Lanarth Farm}_thatched cart house approx. 500 years old.Farm on site for many centuries and in Nicholls family for 500 years{ {Former Mills:}Tregonwell,Tuckingmill and Carne. {Churches:}Manaccan_ancient.Fig tree grows from south wall. Former vicar, Rev.Polwhele, was topographer,poet and author.Present vicar_Rev.Trevor McCabe. St.Anthony_built before 1170,restored 1890.Still no electric lights_beautifully lit by candles. Holy well in churchyard. {Bosahan Mansion:}Built in 1950's to replace older building.Many traditional farmhouses and buildings. Manaccan village well restored 1985. {Landscape:}Rivers,fields,woodland.Area designated area of outstanding natural beauty.
